name: An Meta Modern escape room.
description:
An Meta Modern Escape room.

is an escape room, which is having some puzzles, for the player to progress through some rooms in order to find out if they've really escaped.

This has mainly been a bit of a learning sprint in my progression of VR development. 

Audio by https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/gripping-pads-sounds

Run with an Oculus Rift/Rift S/ Quest connected as PCVR.
